newsitem.title: COLOMBIA: SANTANDER CUTS RATING ON COLOMBIA'S NOEL.
newsitem.headline: SANTANDER CUTS RATING ON COLOMBIA'S NOEL.

text.p: Santander Investment cut its investment rating of Colombian food manufacturer Noel from market perform to underperform in a report issued Wednesday.

The research group based the recommendation on weak second quarter results of $3.3 million and an earning per share of $0.06, compared to its estimate of $0.07, which it said was a 30 percent year-on-year drop in dollar terms.
